snippet: The Harris County district attorney’s office said that it would investigate charges that a Houston doctor, Douglas Karpen, had delivered live babies during abortions and killed them.
abstract: Harris County, Tex, district attorney’s office says it will investigate charges that Houston doctor Douglas Karpen delivered live babies during third-trimester abortions and killed them.
lead_paragraph: The Harris County district attorney’s office said that it would investigate charges that a Houston doctor, Douglas Karpen, had delivered live babies during abortions and killed them.
